title: How To Improve Image Accessibility for Esri Map Tour StoryMap Application
featured-image-alt: people holding a street map and pointing to a location on the map
teaser: Providing the most accessible websites and browser-based applications should be a goal for every web developer.  I recently developed a solution for adding the alt attribute for img elements for the Esri Map Tour StoryMap application.

title: Building A Leaflet.js Map App With A jQuery UI Date Picker
featured-image-alt: a construction site within a city between two buildings
teaser: We developed a web map app for our Planning Department that shows subdivision and land development plans reviewed by their office.  One of the key features of the app was to allow users to filter plans by received date.  We used the jQuery UI Date Picker to build a simple widget.

title: My Experience Contributing to Open Source Projects
featured-image-alt: people sitting in a conference room having a meeting
teaser: 2019 was a year in which I ramped up my contributions to open source projects.  I've learned so much on this journey.  I wanted to some some thoughts from my experience.
